name: KÃ¦nd1
description:
An apple ginger hard candy. Nothing much else to write. Notes can be found on reddit.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/cweeme/k%C3%A6nd1_an_apple_hard_candy_with_ginger_accents/
author: matthewkocanda

reviews.text: Awesome recipe, I rarely vape anything for more than 2 days, and I vaped this for a week. Next I think I will try more hard candy, I think it can stand 1%. And I also used .5% natures flavors ginger instead of flavorah. Normally I won't rate a recipe if I had to sub, but this is just so damn good.
